body:
On 30 May 2002, at 11:24, Westling, Robert wrote:


> ... was interested in what machines are
> currently thought of as providing the fastest rendering
> times.  I have Radiance running on OSX and Linux boxes, but
> they are older G3 and Xeon 500 cpus.  


Robert-


Have a peek at these urls:


http://astronomy.swin.edu.au/~pbourke/radiance/benchrad/


http://mark.technolope.org/pages/rad_bench.html


The latter (which is based on the former's tests) has 
some timings for the latest hardware, including 
Powerbooks (G4) running OSX.  Interesting reading.




 Rob Guglielmetti <rpg777@earthlink.net>
    http://home.earthlink.net/~rpg777
___
